<<<<<<< HEAD
The description and use of two arithmetick instruments together with a short treatise, explaining and demonstrating the ordinary operations of arithmetick, as likewise a perpetual almanack and several useful tables : presented to His most excellent Majesty Charles II ... / by S. Morland. Morland, Samuel, Sir, 1625-1695.
ca. 161 p. in various pagings : ill., port.
Printed and are to be sold by Moses Pitt ..., London : 1673.
Contains engraved portrait frontispiece. Numerous errors in pagination. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
